definition: a party favor consisting of a paper roll (usually containing candy or a small favor) that pops when pulled at both ends
details:
noun
- a party favor consisting of a paper roll (usually containing candy or a small favor) that pops when pulled at both ends
= synonyms: snapper
- firework consisting of a small explosive charge and fuse in a heavy paper casing
= synonyms: firecracker, banger
- a thin crisp wafer made of flour and water with or without leavening and shortening
- a programmer who cracks (gains unauthorized access to) computers, typically to do malicious things
= example: a programmer who cracks (gains unauthorized access to) computers, typically to do malicious things
- a poor White person in the southern United States
= synonyms: redneck
